title: Plane Crash Ragdoll Simulator
description: Plane Crash Ragdoll Simulator is a 3D airplane game where you step into the shoes of a fearless pilot. Your mission is to survive a relentless barrage of rockets targeting your aircraft. Despite its apparent simplicity, the game delivers an adrenaline rush as you fire rockets at enemies and navigate through treacherous skies. Take control of various planes and helicopters, unlocking and customizing unique skins. Your goal is to navigate the dangerous skies to the finish point, but be careful if you hit the ground, your plane will explode!
